definitions: in a way that involves marriage to one person at a time

examples.text: in the historical period, Greeks were expected to marry monogamously

shortDefinitions: in way that involves marriage to one person at time

definitions: in a way that involves a sexual relationship with only one partner

examples.text: Crispin and I have been dating monogamously for two years

shortDefinitions: in way that involves sexual relationship with only one partner

definitions: in a way that involves having only one mate at a time
shortDefinitions: in way that involves having only one mate at time
